description: Number of connected trivalent graphs with 2n nodes and girth exactly 6.
references: CRC Handbook of Combinatorial Designs, 1996, p. 647.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Jason Kimberley, Index of sequences counting connected k-regular simple graphs with girth exactly g
crossrefs: Connected 3-regular simple graphs with girth exactly g: A198303 (triangle); specified g: A006923 (g=3), A006924 (g=4), A006925 (g=5), this sequence (g=6), A006927 (g=7).
Connected 3-regular simple graphs with girth at least g: A185131 (triangle);  A002851 (g=3), A014371 (g=4), A014372 (g=5), A014374 (g=6), A014375 (g=7), A014376 (g=8).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Definition corrected to include "connected", and "girth at least 6" minus "girth at least 7" formula provided by _Jason Kimberley_, Dec 12 2009
